str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To corrupt, spoil, destroy, ruin. Probably strengthened from phthio; properly, to shrivel or wither, i.e. To spoil or to ruin.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
A temple, a shrine, that part of the temple where God himself resides. From a primary naio; a fane, shrine, temple.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.

str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
